taskbody.context: The default configuration of audit logging requires 10GB of storage in /var/log/serviced on master host nodes. For high-availability deployments, recommends mounting remote storage at /var/log/serviced. Use this procedure to create the mount point.

step.cmd: Log in to the master host .
Create a mount point for audit logs.
step.info: The default location for serviced audit logs is /var/log/serviced. The location is determined by the SERVICED_LOG_PATH variable in /etc/default/serviced.
For more information about mounting a remote filesystem, refer to your operating system documentation.
